## âœ… Checklist

Please ensure your PR meets these requirements:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My changes follow the style and format of the existing content
- [ ] I have tested all code examples (if applicable)
- [ ] I have verified all links work correctly
- [ ] Content fits within the 120-minute daily time structure
- [ ] I have added appropriate learning resources (text-first approach)
- [ ] Technical accuracy has been verified
- [ ] Spelling and grammar have been checked
- [ ] Changes are focused and don't include unrelated modifications

## ğŸ“š Resources Added/Modified

If you've added or changed learning resources:

- [ ] Links are accessible and working
- [ ] Video alternatives provided where possible
- [ ] Bandwidth limitations considered
